import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, useParams, Link, useNavigate, } from "react-router-dom"; const Filter = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [FilterData, setData] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios .get(`https://admin.lining.com.np/api/Fresh_arrivals/${FilterData}`) .then((response) => { // debugger; console.log("res", response); setData(response.data.categories); }) .catch((e) => { console.log("e", e); }); }, []); return ( <>
{!FilterData ? "" :

Filter by Category

}
    {!FilterData ? "No Data Found." : FilterData.map((categories) => { return (
  • {categories.category_name}
    • ); })}

Male

Female

Unisex

Girls

Rs 2,500 - Rs 5,000

Rs 5,000 - Rs 10,000

Rs 10,000 - Rs 25,000

); }; export default Filter;
